page.title: 20LIMERSTONE DOWNS/COMPILERS
page.content:
The viewpoint on Limerstone downs offers a marvellous view over our D_Block. There is a pillar at the top bearing a metal plate with compass points on it and arrows pointing to Le Havre, Edinburgh and nearer places such as Newport or Brighstone itself. ______________________________________
This survey was completed by pupils from Lower Four at Upper Chine School: Jane Edwards Amabel Yorke Victoria Browning Elizabeth Shaw Kerry Gulliford Anthea Worby Katharine Stenlake Tamsin May Tamsin Waterhouse Kerry Jones Joanne Lake Helen Cross Caroline Mansell Clare Brophy Sarah Richards Vanessa Pearce Angela Sims_Williams ______________________________________
